00051 #ifndef H_Symbol 
00052 # define H_Symbol
00053 
00054 # include <string>
00055 
00056 # include <boost/flyweight.hpp>
00057 # include <boost/flyweight/no_tracking.hpp>
00058 # include <boost/flyweight/intermodule_holder.hpp>
00059 
00060 # include "IOstreamable.hh"
00061 # include "Hashable.hh"
00062 # include "StringExtract.hh"
00063 
00064 namespace TREX {
00065   namespace utils {
00066 
00083     template< class CharT, class Traits=std::char_traits<CharT>,
00084              class Alloc=std::allocator<CharT> >
00085     class BasicSymbol :public ostreamable, public istreamable, 
00086                      public Hashable {
00087     public:
00089       typedef std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, Alloc> str_type;
00090       
00091     private:
00103       typedef typename 
00104         boost::flyweight< str_type,
00105                        boost::flyweights::no_tracking,
00106                        boost::flyweights::intermodule_holder > ref_type;
00107 
00108     public:
00115       BasicSymbol(str_type const &str = str_type()) 
00116        :m_name(create(str)) {}
00127       BasicSymbol(CharT const *str, size_t len =str_type::npos)
00128        :m_name(create(str, len)) {}
00135       BasicSymbol(BasicSymbol const &other)
00136        :m_name(other.m_name) {}
00138       ~BasicSymbol() {
00139       }
00140 
00149       BasicSymbol &operator= (BasicSymbol const &other) {
00150        m_name = other.m_name;
00151        return *this;
00152       }
00153 
00164       BasicSymbol &reset(CharT const *str=NULL, size_t len=str_type::npos) {
00165        m_name = create(str, len);
00166        return *this;
00167       }
00168       
00176       bool empty() const {
00177        return m_name.get().empty();
00178       }
00183       size_t length() const {
00184        return size_t(empty()?0:m_name->size());
00185       }
00186       
00200       bool operator==(BasicSymbol const &other) const {
00201        return m_name==other.m_name;
00202       }
00216       bool operator!=(BasicSymbol const &other) const {
00217        return !operator==(other);
00218       }
00230       bool operator< (BasicSymbol const &other) const;
00242       bool operator> (BasicSymbol const &other) const {
00243        return other.operator< (*this);
00244       }
00256       bool operator<=(BasicSymbol const &other) const {
00257        return !operator> (other);
00258       }
00270       bool operator>=(BasicSymbol const &other) const {
00271        return !operator< (other);
00272       }
00273 
00278       str_type const &str() const {
00279        return m_name.get();
00280       }
00281 
00282     private:
00284       ref_type m_name;
00294       static ref_type create(str_type const &str);
00305       static ref_type create(CharT const *str, size_t len);
00306 
00307       std::ostream &print_to(std::ostream &out) const;
00308       std::istream &read_from(std::istream &in);
00309       size_t hash() const;
00310 
00311     }; // TREX::utils::BasicSymbol<>
00312 
00313 # define In_H_Symbol
00314 #  include "bits/Symbol.tcc"
00315 # undef In_H_Symbol
00316 
00325     typedef BasicSymbol<char> Symbol;
00326 
00327     
00338     template<>
00339     inline Symbol string_cast<Symbol>(std::string const &in,
00340                                   std::ios_base &(*format)(std::ios_base &)) {
00341       return Symbol(in);
00342     }
00343   } // TREX::utils
00344 } // TREX

00346 #endif // H_Symbol
